name: B2B Marketing
overview:
B2B Marketing is part of a portfolio of products â€“ including B2B Marketing magazine, training events, an annual conference, benchmarking reports and the B2B Marketing Awards â€“ which reach over 50,000 professionals working at the very heart of the business-to-business marketing community.

A dedicated B2B marketing resource B2B Marketing was established in 2004 by co-founders Joel Harrison and James Farmer after the pair noticed a gap in the market for a dedicated B2B marketing information resource.

If you are part of this fast-moving, ever-changing industry, you need to be part of B2B Marketing. Share content, read the latest industry news and blogs, search through our comprehensive Knowledge Bank or build your career with the only jobs board dedicated to B2B marketing positions.

Email services Sign up now for our range of informative e-bulletins, best practice and product-focused newsletters to keep your finger on the pulse and keep up-to-date with latest the B2B marketing developments.

Membership rewards Choose your B2B Marketing membership level and you can take advantage of exclusive features including our free-to-view webcast service, inclusion in our extensive Supplier Directory and access to third-party white papers and reports.
